There is no more solemn duty for a commander-in-chief than taking care of servicemembers, veterans, and their families. As president, I will commit to expanding access to benefits to a half million veterans.
https://medium.com/@KamalaHarris/kamalas-promise-to-america-s-veterans-and-military-families-176628ca018f

Remember when Fox News made the grave mistake of actually telling people what we’re fighting for?

Ah, memories. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ED5cNbBWsAEklRk.jpg

Betsy DeVos may not agree, but we believe young people should leave school excited about the future—not saddled with tens of thousands of dollars in student debt.

We will cancel student debt and make public colleges, universities and trade schools tuition-free.
@JordanUhl I’m going to start tailoring talking points to see what we can get them to drink out of next 🤣

Corruption.

Plain and simple.

This is why I’ve introduced the biggest anti-corruption bill since Watergate. #EndCorruptionNow
https://www.politico.com/story/2019/09/06/air-force-trump-scottish-retreat-1484337

RT @RepDWStweets Here’s how federal budgeting is supposed to work: the military requests the resources needed to keep America safe, and then Congress approves funds. But now, @realDonaldTrump is trying to steal billions of $$$ to pay for his xenophobic border wall. I’m not going to stand for it. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1170319343869149184/img/38ZrHbnOaz9Sd449.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1170319343869149184/vid/480x270/HyrG5CaWQ3ResSjb.mp4?tag=13

We must call out these hateful attacks wherever and whenever they happen. LGBTQ+ Americans should be able to live free from fear or discrimination. I’m fighting for your rights every day. https://www.8newsnow.com/news/anti-gay-slur-painted-on-lgbtq-center-in-las-vegas/

I am not afraid—and if Democrats are going to win, you can’t be afraid either. This is our moment in history. This is our moment to dream big and fight hard. Thank you, @NHDems! #NHDems2020 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ED5-ShjWkAEQlcv.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1170510562683424768/vid/320x320/XAutpYNH-Ma5bByd.mp4?tag=13

You never build a great society that way." - Margaret Thatcher http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1170099664093351936/pu/img/Tk9z_s1HWJD6jjMt.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1170099664093351936/pu/vid/320x320/nIqWHwvh0ZJmJRuj.mp4?tag=10

Am excited for TX-LSU game today!  @SteveScalise and I have a wager:  Steve gets Texas BBQ & Shiner Bock if LSU wins; I get gator, gumbo & Abita beer if (when) Texas wins. #HookEm

It’s shameful that the Solomon Islands is bending to Beijing’s pressure to sever ties with Taiwan. Congress should pass the TAIPEI Act and send a strong message that the U.S. will not stay silent as the Chinese govt aggressively moves to isolate Taiwan.
https://www.reuters.com/article/us-pacific-china-solomonislands/beijing-offers-development-fund-if-solomon-islands-breaks-ties-with-taiwan-government-idUSKCN1VQ0EA

THANK GOD FOR @RonanFarrow 

https://www.newyorker.com/news/news-desk/how-an-elite-university-research-center-concealed-its-relationship-with-jeffrey-epstein

This effort to deny people their fundamental right to vote is abhorrent and a clear reminder that voter suppression is real in America. https://twitter.com/repmarciafudge/status/1170083253870616576 QT @RepMarciaFudge Another 200,000+ Ohioans were purged from voter rolls today, even after multiple errors were discovered on the state's lists.  This is voter suppression in action.  

Every American has the unfettered and unabridged right to vote! #StopThePurge https://www.dispatch.com/news/20190903/federal-judge-says-ohio-voter-purge-can-continue

RT @seiucalifornia Thank you for standing with workers @BernieSanders! https://twitter.com/BernieSanders/status/1170355216929239041 QT @BernieSanders I stand with the 3,000 @SEIU1021 and @IFPTE21 public servants fighting to provide quality city services to the residents of Oakland. It's unacceptable that 600 positions are currently unfilled. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JzVgrFaAZqo

Spent the last month traveling across the Lone Star State to meet with fellow Texans & to discuss issues that are impacting them & their communities. IT’S TIME FOR @ewarren IN THE WHITE HOUSE! #NHDems2020 #WinWithWarren #FITN http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1170295009037422594/pu/img/puYZ90vDCCep1iid.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1170295009037422594/pu/vid/480x270/dwQVL9OMIBGK-zNF.mp4?tag=10

When we join together, work together, and fight together—there's nothing we can't get done. That's how we're going to beat Trump—and that's how we'll rise.

My message is simple: 

We are stronger than this.
We are better than this.
And we are all in this together.

Rent has gotten to extortion-level highs in New York City, and there’s a whole lot of lawbreaking that happens because so many working people are on the brink.

Housing is a right. NY’s rent laws must be enforced if abusive, predatory actors are breaking them. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1170301207329562624 QT @nytimes One woman who was searching for an apartment in NYC was asked to pay a $100 application fee, followed by a $400 “processing fee,” even though such upfront fees had been capped at $20 as a result of new rent laws passed by New York lawmakers in June. https://trib.al/PS22Qq5

As a young girl, I'd often go on walks with my grandfather in India, who'd discuss how people should be treated equally—regardless of the circumstances of their birth.

My heritage is why I’m proud to launch our South Asians #ForThePeople community: https://action.kamalaharris.org/signup/org-cons-south-asians/?utm_source=social&utm_medium=twitter&utm_campaign=190906&utm_content=launch http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1170422293765472257/pu/img/95VRplPl3djAnvyw.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1170422293765472257/pu/vid/320x320/SoyyYtL9ZvRQWSF7.mp4?tag=10

Everyone should own a piece of our democracy. At the #NHDems2020 convention, I talked about how we’re building a grassroots movement.

No PACs and giant corporations, just people—in New Hampshire and all around our country. Let’s dream big, fight hard, and win in 2020! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ED5ha91XoAAcTwA.jpg

When my staff played the video from my town hall yesterday, it was upsetting. I didn’t hear the words the man used in that moment, but if I had I would’ve stopped and corrected him. I’m sorry. That word and others like it aren’t acceptable. Ever. https://twitter.com/CBSNews/status/1170434381003001857 QT @CBSNews Yesterday, someone at a @KamalaHarris event called Pres. Trump “mentally retarded.”

The 2020 candidate told @CHueyBurns the term is “incredibly offensive” and said in 2019 you would think "people would have a much better understanding of how hurtful a term like that can be." http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1170434167164809220/img/9py5f92AMP__xFsS.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1170434167164809220/vid/480x270/dlLn3-iuQiGPVolT.mp4?tag=13

Following the conclusion of the #G7Parlement, it was a privilege to lay a wreath at the U.S. Naval Monument at Brest, a beautiful memorial to the sacrifice of American heroes who fought and sacrificed here in France during World War I. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ED5RzraXoAAMqwB.jpg

Climate change hurts low income communities the most - we can’t talk about solutions without talking about environmental justice. https://twitter.com/AmericanForests/status/1169223715168505856 QT @AmericanForests "If we show you a map of tree canopy in virtually any city in America, we're also showing you a map of income," says @JadDaley. "And in many cases we're showing you a map of race and ethnicity." via @meg_anders @shmcminn @npr #TreeEquity #UrbanForestry https://www.npr.org/2019/09/04/755349748/trees-are-key-to-fighting-urban-heat-but-cities-keep-losing-them

Always good to meet with my friend Speaker John Bercow of the British House of Commons. Today at #G7Parlement we discussed the special U.S.-U.K. relationship, the latest on Brexit and our enduring commitment to NATO. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ED5BB1oXsAAW28l.jpg

The Camp Fire killed at least 85 people and destroyed 14,000 homes.

It was the most destructive wildfire in California's history—and climate change is making fires much worse.

We will address the climate crisis and pass a Green New Deal. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ED4KYKkXsAoGg0m.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1170356649707655168/vid/480x270/T3layjy_z2iHH7jg.mp4?tag=13

The energy of our grassroots movement—that’s what keeps me going. Thank you for coming out today for the #NHDems2020 convention! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ED5GXaRXkAAaT_y.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ED5GXaSX4AApOuL.jpg

It was a pleasure to meet with President @Roberto_Fico of the Italian Chamber of Deputies today at #G7Parlement to discuss U.S.-Italy relations and how the climate crisis is a national security issue for us all. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ED4yu9VXoAAQPDQ.jpg
Congress gives hundreds of billions of dollars to fund our endless wars each year, yet making public college and universities tuition-free is somehow "too radical." I reject that.

Here are 6 of the 10 fastest-growing jobs in America:
 
• Personal care aide—$24,020
• Food preparer—$21,250
• Home health aide—$24,200
• Cook—$26,530
• Waiter—$21,780
• Janitor—$26,110

If we want a decent, humane society, workers must get at least $15 an hour and a union. https://twitter.com/EconomicPolicy/status/1170064879128125442 QT @EconomicPolicy Newly released numbers from the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics project that six of the ten occupations expected to have the most total job growth over the next decade pay less than $27,000 a year. http://inthesetimes.com/working/entry/22043/jobs-unions-bls-epi-labor

Under a Medicare for All system, we are going to guarantee health care to all people as a human right. Working people should not have to search around for coupons or risk going into bankruptcy to afford their medical care. https://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2019/09/05/757708356/groupon-for-medical-scans-discounted-care-can-have-hidden-costs

RT @RashidaTlaib This is exactly why the Emoluments Clause in the United States Constitution exist. #ImpeachmentInquiryNow https://twitter.com/OversightDems/status/1169983449886859264 QT @OversightDems BREAKING: @OversightDems are investigating the Vice President’s stay at the Trump International Golf Links and Hotel in Doonbeg, Ireland—180 miles away from the Vice President’s official meetings with Irish officials in Dublin. https://oversight.house.gov/news/press-releases/oversight-and-judiciary-committees-investigate-pence-trip-to-trump-golf-resort http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EDydvrzXYAAsMxY.jpg

California is a national leader in environmental standards, yet the Trump administration has been threatening to undo our progress for years. We must keep up the fight because every person in America has the most fundamental right to breathe clean air. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1169830114642644994 QT @nytimes In a direct challenge to California lawmakers, President Trump is strongly considering a plan to revoke the state's legal authority to set state tailpipe pollution standards https://trib.al/k1W0Uup

In 2016 voter turnout was only 46% among voters under 30 compared to 71% of voters over 65.

Young people do not think a political system which lets billionaires buy elections works for them.

We are going to change that and give them a reason to get involved.

Too often, elite institutions & corrupt people/orgs have a symbiotic relationship: they launder each other’s reputations for the illusion of legitimacy & prestige.

In this instance,leaders at MIT’s Media Lab knowingly buffed the reputation of a child rapist bc he paid for it. https://twitter.com/newyorker/status/1170169159071805440 QT @NewYorker Documents obtained by The New Yorker reveal that the M.I.T. Media Lab had a deeper fund-raising relationship with Jeffrey Epstein than it has previously acknowledged, and it attempted to conceal the extent of its contacts with him. https://www.newyorker.com/news/news-desk/how-an-elite-university-research-center-concealed-its-relationship-with-jeffrey-epstein?utm_source=twitter&mbid=social_twitter&utm_brand=tny&utm_social-type=owned&utm_medium=social

New Hampshire, we need to bring the same energy & enthusiasm you showed me today to the election next year & beyond. Beating Donald Trump is the floor, not the ceiling—let's win this election, and then quickly get to work together to build a fair & just country for all Americans. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1170443380851204098/img/lnfBVIIIC7Il9-9S.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1170443380851204098/vid/284x270/dQGVd3CuPFll1LvQ.mp4?tag=13

Four auto manufacturers decided to reject Donald Trump’s rollback of fuel economy standards. Now Trump's using the Justice Department to attack those companies for embarrassing him.

That’s disgraceful. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/09/06/climate/automakers-california-emissions-antitrust.html

The ability to seek refuge in the United States is part of what makes us who we are as Americans—and Trump is sabotaging the program every way he can. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/09/06/us/politics/trump-refugees-united-states.html
